name: PieChart

props.name: dividerWidth
props.description: The width of the divider between the segments

props.name: dividerColor
props.description: The color of the divider between the segments

snippet: <PieChart segments={[{percentage: 50, color: Colors.blue30}, {percentage: 30, color: Colors.red30}, {percentage: 20, color: Colors.green30}]} diameter={144}/>
